name: Jewel Galaxy: Infinite Puzzle
description:
Enjoy the sparkling, diamond sharp adventure!

Make stunning combos and keep the board clear of rocks and other obstacles because the fun with Jewels just became Infinite!

Try your skills - match, align and combine the gems. Face the increasingly difficult challenges appearing on the map. How high can you score?

---
